battleTraits.name: Awaken the Runes
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Start of Your Turn
battleTraits.lore: In battle, a Fyreslayer’s ur-gold runes are awakened, filling them with the blazing power of Grimnir.
battleTraits.declare: Pick 1 of the ur-gold runes from the **ur-gold runes** table, then make an **activation roll** of D6. Each urgold rune can only be activated once per battle.
battleTraits.effect: On a 1-5, the rune’s **standard effect** applies. On a 6, the rune’s **enhanced effect** applies as well. The effects last until the start of your next turn.
battleTraits.altText: The Ur-gold Runes table. Rune of Fury. Standard Effect. Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly units. Enhanced Effect. In addition, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of your units’ melee weapons. Rune of Searing Heat. Standard Effect. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of your units’ melee weapons. Enhanced Effect. In addition, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of your units’ melee weapons. Rune of Fiery Determination. Standard Effect. Your units have Ward (5+). Enhanced Effect. In addition, add 1 to save rolls for friendly units. Rune of Relentless Zeal. Standard Effect. Add 2" to the Move characteristic of your units. Enhanced Effect. In addition, add 2 to charge rolls for your units.

battleTraits.name: Rune of Fiery Determination
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: A sliver of Grimnir’s awesome resolve courses through the Fyreslayers.
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****UR-GOLD RUNE**** abilities this battle round.

Friendly **FYRESLAYERS** units have **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the battle round.

battleTraits.name: Rune of Relentless Zeal
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: The hearts of the Fyreslayers swell with a fiery conviction that sees them bear down upon the foe with surprising swiftness.
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****UR-GOLD RUNE** A**bilities this battle round.

For the rest of the battle round, friendly **FYRESLAYERS** units can use ****CHARGE**** abilities even if they used a ****RUN**** ability in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Rune of Fury
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Start of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: The rune of fury grants the Fyreslayers a portion of their god’s battle rage.
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****UR-GOLD RUNE** A**bilities this battle round.

For the rest of the battle round, friendly **FYRESLAYERS** units have **STRIKE-FIRST** while they are in combat with an enemy unit that charged in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Rune of Farsight
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Shooting Phase
battleTraits.lore: Empowered by this rune, the Fyreslayers hurl their throwing axes into the enemy with devastating accuracy.
battleTraits.declare:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****UR-GOLD RUNE**** abilities this battle round.

Pick any number of enemy units within 10" of any visible friendly **FYRESLAYERS** units to be targets.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: Rune of Searing Heat
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: The edges of the Fyreslayers’ weapons glow with the heat of the forge.
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****UR-GOLD RUNE**** abilities this battle round.

Melee weapons used by friendly **FYRESLAYERS** units have **Crit** **(Mortal)** for the rest of the battle round.

heroicTraits.name: Ash-beard
heroicTraits.lore: So great is this priest’s mastery of magmic energies that they smoulder eternally with Grimnir’s power.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is not a ****PRIEST****, they have ****PRIEST** (1)**. If this unit was already a ****PRIEST****, add 1 to this unit’s chanting rolls.

heroicTraits.name: Fiercely Competitive
heroicTraits.lore: This leader is incredibly stubborn and won’t back down from even the boldest of challenges.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is in combat with an enemy unit that has **STRIKE-FIRST**, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST**. If this unit is in combat with an enemy unit that uses the ‘All-out **Attack**’ command, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Blood of the Berzerker
heroicTraits.lore: In this noble duardin is fiery aggression given form.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to **charge** rolls for friendly **FYRESLAYERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Fyresteel Throwing Axes
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: These sidearms are deadly when hurled at close range.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick any number of friendly units that are not in combat and are within 10" of any enemy units.
regimentAbilities.effect: For each of those units, pick a visible enemy unit within 10" of it and roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Magmic Tunnels
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of the First Battle Round
regimentAbilities.lore: Tunnels carved by runic magic enable a band of Fyreslayers to attack from an unseen quarter.
regimentAbilities.effect: Pick up to 2 friendly units. Remove them from the battlefield and set them up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Too Stubborn to Die
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Long in the beard, your general shrugs off wounds that would fell a lesser duardin.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Horn of Grimnir
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Inlaid with powerful runes of ur-gold, a blast from this horn inspires those bloody and bruised to continue the fight.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick your general to use this ability if they are not in combat.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Roll a dice for each friendly unit on the battlefield that has any slain models. On a 3+, you can return 1 slain model to that unit.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Powerful Presence
spearheadEnhancements.lore: With a roaring voice and mighty displays of strength, your general is an imposing figure upon the battlefield.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Add 3 to your general’s control score.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Spirit of Grimnir
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The very presence of your general sets ur-gold ablaze.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: You can re-roll **activation rolls** you make for the ‘Ur-gold Runes’ ability (see Battle Traits).

artefactsOfPower.name: Draught of the Finest Magmalt
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: A single draught of this fiery beverage sends shivers of energy surging through a Fyreslayer from toes to crest.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Ash-cloud Rune
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Enemy Hero Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: The bearer of this rune can call down a column of soot that blankets the battlefield.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Until the start of your next turn, friendly ****INFANTRY**** units cannot be targeted by shooting attacks while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Droth-helm
artefactsOfPower.lore: This ancient helm is said to have been worn by the first Zharrgrim priest to tame a Magmadroth.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for **Companion** weapons used by friendly **FYRESLAYERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Summon Runic Fyrewall
abilities.lore: At the command of a Zharrgrim priest, a Runic Fyrewall can be raised from the fiery chasms far beneath their sootstained feet. Glinting with runes, this scintillating barrier of gold and flame bars the enemy’s path and protects the flanks of the Fyreslayers’ fyrds as they press ever forward.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Runic Fyrewall** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **FYRESLAYERS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Runic Fyrewall** wholly within 12" of the chanter and visible to them.

abilities.name: Summon Zharrgron Flame-spitter
abilities.lore: By concentrating their magmic powers, a Zharrgrim priest can summon forth fiery heat from the bowels of the realm. With a rumble and a crack, an angry geyser opens up in the earth, bombarding the foe with molten death.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Zharrgron Flame-spitter** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **FYRESLAYERS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Zharrgron Flame-spitter** wholly within 12" of the chanter and visible to them.

abilities.name: Summon Molten Infernoth
abilities.lore: An elemental manifestation that personifies the blazing wrath of Vulcatrix, a Molten Infernoth can be drawn to battle by a Zharrgrim priest. Bursting out of the realm’s crust, the ferocious entity lumbers across the battlefield, inspiring Fyreslayers while blasting the enemy with raging torrents of lava.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Molten Infernoth** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **FYRESLAYERS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Molten Infernoth** wholly within 12" of the chanter, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Wrath of Vulcatrix
abilities.lore: The priest sets the runes pressed into a Magmadroth’s hide ablaze, and the colossal beast roars with fury.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **FYRESLAYERS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **MAGMADROTH** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn, the ‘Battle Damaged’ ability has no effect on the target and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s **Companion** weapons.

If the chanting roll was 8+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s **Companion** weapons for every 4 damage points the target has.

abilities.name: Prayer of Grimnir's Fury
abilities.lore: A red rage fills the hearts of those blessed by this furious benediction.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **FYRESLAYERS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **FYRESLAYERS INFANTRY HERO** wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
The target can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this turn. After the first is used, however, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

If the chanting roll was 8+, also add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Prayer of Ash
abilities.lore: Borne on a gust of hot forge-winds, a circle of ash settles around the priest’s allies, protecting them from harm.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **FYRESLAYERS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **FYRESLAYERS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that friendly unit until the start of your next turn.

If the chanting roll was 8+, also subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of attacks that target that friendly unit until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Ancient Bloodlines
abilities.lore: Among the most elite formations of the Fyreslayers are the mighty Scales of Vulcatrix. The proud and majestic Magmadroths in this formation are as venerated as those of their lodge’s royal family.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to the Health characteristic of friendly **MAGMADROTH** units.

abilities.name: Berserk Kindred
abilities.lore: Filled with the fierce fighting spirit of Grimnir, the Warrior Kinband hurls itself at the foe. In their fury, they wield their glinting fyresteel axes so quickly that they appear as a blazing blur.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **FYRESLAYERS INFANTRY** units that charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Bulwark of Molten Stone
abilities.lore: Shrouded in the shimmering heat of the forge-temple, the Forge Brethren direct their magmapikes to form blazing  barricades of lava with sustained volleys of fire, before returning to blasting their enemies to ash.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for friendly **FYRESLAYERS INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within friendly territory.

abilities.name: Martial Pride and Stubborn Will
abilities.lore: The Lords of the Lodge burn with a rage tempered by sacred oaths of war.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly **FYRESLAYERS HEROES**. In addition, the control scores of **FYRESLAYERS HEROES** cannot be modified by enemy abilities.
